channel.title: Home on Level Up Chess Coaching
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Level Up Chess Coaching

item.title: 1-on-1 Online Coaching
item.description: Personalized 1-1 session with in depth game analysis review for beginners all the way to expert. I offer chess instruction for all levels of chess players. All instruction is available online in one-on-one sessions. Each lesson is a minimum of one hour and is typically once a week. I offer chess tournament preparation including opening repetoire and game assessments. Some advanced students also opt for the sparring partner package. Pricing Chess lessons are $35 per session.

item.title: 1-on-1 In Person Coaching
item.description: Personalized 1-1 session with in depth game analysis review for beginners all the way to expert. I offer chess instruction for all levels of chess players. All instruction is available online in one-on-one sessions. Each lesson is a minimum of one hour and is typically once a week. I offer chess tournament preparation including opening repetoire and game assessments. Some advanced students also opt for the sparring partner package. Pricing Chess lessons are $40 per session.
